185782402.review:
Completed the game in online co-op, and we enjoyed our experience. Though we faced some issues, like with the cutcenes not showing up not even for ending, and an issue where the levels will repeat their preset layouts unless the host see some cutcenes in singleplayer first, which was an odd issue. Maybe these issues are exclusive to online play and the local co-op play is fine, but I can't comment on that.

Another issue I had with the game is in regard of balancing. We felt that the last couple of levels had an atrocious platforming that can be beaten with regular abilities, but are designed to be tackled using double jump or mid air dash, which are not a guaranteed drop per run. This is issue is killing my interest in playing this game further, since without the aforementioned abilities; the platforming required for these levels is not what I consider enjoyable at all!
I hope that this is something that was rectified the sequel 30XX.

185734069.review: Basicamente Megaman Souls-like, divertidinho mas não me prendeu, mas imagino que para quem gosta de jogos no estilo souls-like e curte Megaman esse pode ser uma escolha boa.

185671258.review: If you love platformers, and you love rougelikes, this is the game for you. I haven't played a wink of Mega Man X or the Zero series, being only a classic Mega Man enthusiast, yet I still found this game really hard to put down. The controls are really snappy and responsive, the gameplay loop is satisfying, and the character design/datalore is endearing. I highly recommend this game to anyone looking for a platforming challenge, or high replay value.

184774162.review:
Pero que juego tan bueno!! Es todo lo que quería de un Mega Man X!!

Lo único que no me gusta en si, es que los escenarios son pocos y los jefes tambien. Pero de todas maneras el juego lo vale!!!

9/10

184687564.review: The folks who made this should have been hired by Capcom to make everything from MegaMan X4-8. They took what made MegaManX fun, threw in some roguelite, and made a really awesome game. True innovation, unlike how Capcom has treated our Blue Bomber.

184445524.review: I absolutely recommend this to any Mega Man fan. The game is fantastic, has awesome fast paced combat, tons of items and replayability, and best of all, tons of ways to beat the game. I don't really know what else to say other than it's a shame not many people know about this amazing game, and I'm glad I didn't miss out when I went to get 30XX and mistakenly typed in 20 instead.

184082854.review: 说是致敬，但是致敬不到位，8个BOSS只有四张地图，补给稀少，尤其到大后期要靠特殊武器消陷阱时敌人一个蓝都不给你掉你只能硬吃陷阱组合。小兵倒是不难打叠BUFF完全是一枪一个的，说真的我真的不想再碰高塔连环跳台关了。没蓝消不了激光等着激光洗澡吧。

183958110.review: This game is amazing, fun, and great I'd recommend it to anyone who likes 20XX.

183799232.review:
Très bon jeu, digne héritier de méga man, avec la petite touche qui change tout, le mode coopératif en local.
A acheter sans modération !

183743681.review:
still worth playing

sequel doesn't completely invalidate its existance

183604438.review:
This game had me addicted like crazy.  Even I am shocked that I put about 80 hours into it.  I very rarely can actually play a game for that many hours. 

If you're into the idea of a roguelite game in the style of Mega Man, you can't do any better than this.  I love the music and the gameplay is stellar.  The graphics kind of have that "flash game" look but I found them pleasing to look at and very colorful.  The game also performs great and is smooth as silk at high framerates.

You won't be disappointed!
